contentrichtext.text: '''ESB''' may refer to: {{wiktionary|ESB}} {{TOC right}} == Organizations == *[[ESB Reutlingen]], a business school of the Reutlingen University in Germany *[[ESB Customer Supply]], the incumbent retail supplier of electricity in Ireland *[[ESB Group]], a multinational energy group based in Ireland *[[Edwards School of Business]] of the University of Saskatchewan, Canada *Electric Storage Battery Company, [[Exide]]'s original name *[[Electricity Supply Board]], an Irish electricity provider *[[Elias Sports Bureau]], a statistical and historical sports information organization *[[Entente Sportive de Bingerville]], an Ivorian football club *[[European School, Bergen]], a European school in the Netherlands == Television, film, and music == *''[[Electro-Shock Blues]]'', the second album by alternative rock band Eels *''[[Star Wars Episode V: The Empire Strikes Back]]'', a 1980 American film *[[E Street Band]], a musical group that has periodically toured and recorded with rock musician Bruce Springsteen *E.S.B., ''Extra Special Bitter'': Track 9 from Volume 2 of [[Marian Call]]'s 2011 album ''Something Fierce'' == Technology and computers == * '''E'''nergy '''S'''elective '''B'''ackscattered electron detector, a type of detector used in [[Scanning electron microscope|scanning electron microscopes]] *[[Enterprise service bus]], an abstraction layer on top of an Enterprise Messaging System == Other uses == *[[Empire State Building]], in New York City *[[EsenboÄŸa International Airport]], IATA airport code *[[Extra special bitter|Extra Special Bitter]], a style of ale *[[E.S.B. (horse)|E.S.B.]], a racehorse which won the 1956 Grand National {{disambig}}
